Articles.Content:
Yet another source of merchandise has been struck down, this time it was the Maker Shop. Announcing that about a week ago they shut down which sucks but I'm glad to have gotten my Jeb plushie when I did! I was even considering getting another but alas, I was too slow.

https://shop.makerstudios.com/password

 

Ps- Squad might want to update the website to reflect this, but also because it ends abruptly on their website.

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/index.php?p=maker

"Note: Maker Shops is an external website, so your purchases there are handled by their own store system instead of the KSP Store.
Clicking the above link will simply redirect you to the KSP section at "
I really wanted from stuff from them, never had money though
